frontmatter.title: Riva-Melissa Tez: Philosophy and perspective
frontmatter.description: Notes on an interview with Riva-Melissa Tez. Life is a game. Spread critical reasoning tools. On being creative. Benefits of writing.

frontmatter.title: What won't change?
frontmatter.description: 'What's not going to change in the next 10 years?' And I submit to you that that second question is actually the more important of the two -- because you can build a business strategy around the things that are stable in time.
